mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum rn, r.report_no, m.nickname, r.reason_cd, r.reportdate, r.isprocessed from tbl_report r left join tbl_member m on r.member_no = m.member_no
where reported_reply = 0
where reported_reply != 0 and r.isprocessed = 'N' order by r.report_no ) where rownum <= 50

select r.*, m.nickname, rm.nickname reported_nickname, rm.email reported_email, b.title reported_title, b.content reported_content, ct.value reason_text from tbl_report r left join tbl_member m on r.member_no = m.member_no left join tbl_member rm on r.reported_member = rm.member_no left join tbl_board b on r.reported_board = b.board_no left join tbl_code ct on r.reason_cd = ct.code where report_no = #{report_no}

select r.*, m.nickname, rm.nickname reported_nickname, rm.email reported_email, reply.content reported_content, ct.value reason_text from tbl_report r left join tbl_member m on r.member_no = m.member_no left join tbl_member rm on r.reported_member = rm.member_no left join tbl_reply reply on r.reported_reply = reply.reply_no left join tbl_code ct on r.reason_cd = ct.code where report_no = #{report_no}
